title: Hexakill’s heading back to the Twisted Treeline!

replies.body: i would rather URF mode or at the very minimum have all those modes (URf, poro king, hexakill etc) in customs so you can play whatever mode you want with your friends instead of just the same thing over and over again. even something as simple as call of duty has the option to play any mode privately (or with bots if you have no friends) come on people! urf brought life back into the game and in my experience i never found one toxic player unlike normals or ranked which is full of them starting at the champ select. how about a URF friday? perfect way to conclude the week and just chill on that for the day or weekend.

Or how bout a "game options" menu for customs?
Where you can customise the whole game to recreate or even make your own mode?
This will make league a whole lot more interesting.
Some random Ideas:
You could turn the start gold up to 50k so everyone starts full build,
Or have everyone start at lv18,
Reinforce crystal scars Hide&Seek rules,
Increase bans to 4 per team,
Recreate modes like URF,
mix and Match modes, (URF+Mirror+Hexakill+Snowdown+Poro King)
Increase the limits of old modes, like making a octakill (8v8) mode, or even a decakill (10v10) mode.
WE COULD EXPERIENCE NURF MODE

If we had this in customs (and theres no reason not to), Rito can get some better ideas what the community would like to have as an new offical mode (hide and seek could become offical!)

This guy needs to work for riot, i would pay money to have this option.
yh i agree poor king would be good and all the other game modes made. I like the one where everyone goes the same champ, and when u pick ur enemies champs those are cool
I WISH PEOPLE WOULD STOP COMPLAINING ABOUT URF.... IT COMES OUT  ONCE A YEAR AND PEOPLE GET BORED OF IT WITHIN THE 2 WEEKS THAT IT IS OUT.

Im a bit late to the party ahah but honestly i would fucking love if riot read that and looked into that 
would just be the best it was the best i quit league after urf ended but now im back into it aha got nothing else to do but URF was such a fun game mode were everyone would have fun and no one was left behind

I like the idea of URF Fridays, though ultimately you're still telling the team to maintain a game-mode which they can never *stop* maintaining. URF requires more balance checking than any other mode, lest it get exploited and ruin the whole experience.
Its {{champion:86}}teed to be fun.
Yay everyone's excited.... nope.
I never got to play it the first time around, so I am!
ya same{{item:3070}}

Yeah... URF still remains the best gamemode, and with bans???!!!!
Everyone will just ban the only champs with any chance at getting a Hexakill (e.g. Yi, Katarin,a etc.)
Also, Hexakill was out not that long ago...
"URF still remains the best gamemode" no its not (but thats my opinion) i personally think the best is doom bots
You, my good sir, must be masochistic.

Hexakill was last out about 7 months ago, since then 2 other modes have been released/re-released (Nemesis Draft 3 months ago and URF 1 month ago). It has been a while since Hexakill last made an appearance.
DOOM BOTS
Ban {{champion:55}}!!!
kat isn't op just stun or silence(think silence works) and her ult stops
Yeah Silence stops it cause it is a channelled ability. Silence, stuns, and any displacement stops it.
CAN WE HAVE URF HEXAKILL ALL FOR ONE TT?
I want to see One for all: Mirror Mode
how would that work tho

A game mode from 2013 or 12, howling abyss, and everyone votes for a champion (each champion gets one point). Out of those selected champions, a random is chosen on the percentage of points it has. Then everyone plays that one champion. IF you have never seen it before..
they should do it in Crystal Scar or the Twisted Tree line.
Yeah I really enjoyed Mirror Mode. 5 Karthus ults {{champion:30}}
I have a vague memory of that, i especially remember playing 5v5 soraka before she got updated xD
YH THATS AWESOME!
I HATE HWXAKILL{{item:3070}}

As fun as that is, and I'll be sure to play it, I'd rather just have a permanent TT queue thanks.
Seriously, when was the last update by Riot on the status of that? How far away are we from having enough people to make it worth it? How much more money do we need to throw at them for them to afford it? Is there anything we can do to speed it along? And the same goes for Dominion.

This is not a complaint, this is a genuine question. When can we get some feedback on the progress? Because people have been asking in the boards and not one answer has been given.
i miss the 1v1 gamemode :c
Why not Hexakill mirror URF mode with doombots level spells?

I don't understand why everyone is complaining about it not being URF. Like Honestly people, you're lucky enough to even be getting these fun game modes... Sheesh... If they brought URF out permanently the player base for ranks and normal games would decrease quite quickly, then after about 4 weeks everyone would get bored and go back to the way League is meant to be played, competitively. Yes, URF was fun while it lasted but that's the point, to get you interested when a mode comes out. Everyone needs to chill and just relax for a bit and just have some fun ai?

nah URF needs to come back{{champion:37}}

yay i loved this game mode but i wish riot would bring bak one for all again that was fun too
I'm really excited for this because I got my first penta in hexakill (I was close to the hexakill)
Hexakill was shit. End of story
any chance of assension returning to the game? i fucking loved that gamemode
I'd feel a lot better about this mode if they added ambient xp. If you have one or two people behind on your team they are just going to be behind the entire game.
